pages.text: Higher Demons are willing to aid witches in more occult endeavours, at a cost. After a Higher Demons has been summoned, they must be pledged to. This is done by the demonologist wearing a full set of any Witch Robe variants, ingesting a [Stew of the Grotesque],

and holding a certain other item in their offhand. Depending on the Demon, their benefit will either be passive, in that the Demon must be in the general area for it to work, or active in that the demonologist must specifically interact with the demon.
